Write a Program to Retrieve ASCII Value of a Specific Inputs
IDE Used: Eclipse 


public class ASCII_Value_2 
{
	public static void main(String[] args) 
	{
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		char a='A';
		char b='B';
		
		int asciivalue1=a;
		int asciivalue2=b;
		
		System.out.println("ASCII Value of " +a+ " is: " +asciivalue1);
		System.out.println("ASCII Value of " +b+ " is: " +asciivalue2);
		
		System.out.println();
		
	}

}
